title: EluguHcman
author: EluguHcman
content: A man would not have the enough muscular power, armed less, no possessions and not even intelligently skilful enough than the masses But has dominions of authorities over them.There is said to be dangers in too much power of authorities in one man's hand.If after elected/appointed as a leader/representative of the masses or by a body, and  you realizes you are just a messenger with a limited power of authorities towards the bodies/masses in returns or at your services and by the laws abidments, only then we can make better and the best  in societies to equality, peace, harmony and unity.
